anthropic_config.system: Create a compelling data-driven section showing the impact of [project name]: downloads, users helped, issues resolved, and community growth statistics.

usage_example.python:
from anthropic import Anthropic

client = Anthropic()

message = client.messages.create(
    model="claude-sonnet-4-20250514",
    max_tokens=4096,
    system="""Create a compelling data-driven section showing the impact of [project name]: downloads, users helpe...""",
    messages=[
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(message.content[0].text)
